## Source: ossf-package-analysis (3bc812776fc9ca2678deabf678d9dae58067e353d0d7131e35d68fa452ff57f5)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'model-providers' @ 99.5.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
